review: Great product. Easy to set up and navigate.
author: Linda

review: Works fine but interface is a bit clunky and not as intuitive as Apple TV.  remote does not have headphone output like other Roku hardware.
author: Manu

review: Hoped to use streaming stick in a bedroom but when plugged into the TV, it cannot access the wireless router located at the front of the house. My previous Sony blue-ray player with wireless built-in had no trouble accessing the router from the same location. Thought that the Roku stick would be smaller and more convenient. I verified that the Roku streaming stick was functioning by plugging it into a TV in the room directly across from the wireless router. Works fine when located close to the router. This is my first Roku product and I am very disappointed.
author: Jamie M. Broadhead

review: I love roku and have two other roku's so was excited about trying the stick.  I did not realize it has to be plugged in.  I thought I would have to maybe charge it but it has to stay plugged in so that is not great.
author: Lu Cutlip

review: Can't get it to work on any of our TV's.  Even tried replacing the current Roku 3 but still wouldn't work.  The remote worked with the old 3 when it was plugged in though...... just not the stick itself.  Will be replacing it with another 3.

review: Did  not work and was returned

review: Now that I have a new TV with the Roku Program installed, I don't use the Roku Stick anymore. It is a good product for TV's that don't have the program built in.
